div.h3: What type of place are you looking for

div.class: items-cirle items-cirle-hover mb-2 share-house find-sharehouse find-active-property

div.p: Teamups are when you get together with others who are looking for accommodation and start a new share house together.

div.h3: Where would you like to live?

div.p: We recommend choosing at least 4 suburbs
Help your future flatmate learn about you

div.span: The gender your partner identifies with
The gender your friend identifies with

div.h3: What makes you great to live with?

div.p: Tell your potential flatmates a little about yourself. What do you do for work, what do you like to do for fun and where you are from. Also remember to let them know what you're looking for.
